Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-correlator-cfg API API Reference

API generated from Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-correlator-cfg@2017-05-01.yang

API Endpoint
http://{Controller-IP}:{Controller-Port}/restconf/config/network-topology:network-topology/topology/topology-netconf/node/inetri/yang-ext:mount/
URL '/' code: %2F
Schemes: http
Version: 1.0.0
Leaf Color Code:
   Key  Mandatory  Optional

Paths

SYSLOG-SERVICE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog-service/

Update operation of resource: syslog-service

a1_syslog-service_schema

syslog-servicebody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Syslog Timestamp ServicesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Timestamp debug/log messages configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : {
Timestamp debug messagesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"debug-timestamp-disable": "null", Disable timestamp debug messages

        
"debug-uptime": "null", Timestamp with systime uptime
        : {
Timestamp with date and timePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Set time format for debug msgPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"time-stamp-value": "string", Time

            
"year": "string", Year

            
"msec": "string", Seconds

            
"time-zone": "string" Timezone

          }
        }
      },
      
"enable": "null", Enable timestamp debug/log messages
      : {
Timestamp log messagesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"log-uptime": "null", Timestamp with systime uptime

        
"log-timestamp-disable": "null", Disable timestamp log messages
        : {
Timestamp with date and timePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Set timestamp for log messagePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"time-stamp-value": "string", Time

            
"year": "string", Year

            
"msec": "string", Seconds

            
"time-zone": "string" Timezone

          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

a1_syslog-service_schema

syslog-servicebody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Syslog Timestamp ServicesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {

      : {

"debug-uptime": "null", Timestamp with systime uptime
        : {
Timestamp with date and timePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Set time format for debug msgPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"time-stamp-value": "string", Time

            
"year": "string", Year

            
"msec": "string", Seconds

            
"time-zone": "string" Timezone

          }
        }
      },
      
"enable": "null", Enable timestamp debug/log messages
      : {
Timestamp log messagesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        
"log-uptime": "null", Timestamp with systime uptime

        
"log-timestamp-disable": "null", Disable timestamp log messages

Set timestamp for log messagePUTPOSTDELETEGET

"year": "string", Year

            
"msec": "string", Seconds

            
"time-zone": "string" Timezone

SYSLOG - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/

Update operation of resource: syslog

a1_syslog_schema

syslogbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
syslogPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Configure logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Specifications of the logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET

default: "1024"

default: "6"

default: "6"

range: "1..2047"

      
"threshold": "integer", The size threshold at which a syslog is\ngenerated
range: "1..99"
units: "percentage"

      
"length": "integer", The maximum number of weeks of log to maintain
range: "1..256"

      
"frequency": "string", The collection interval for logs

      
"device": "string", '/disk0:' or '/disk1:' or '/harddisk:'

      
"size": "integer" The total size of the archive
range: "1..2047"

}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

SYSLOG - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/

Create operation of resource: syslog

a1_syslog_schema

syslogbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example

    },

    },

    : {
Archive attributes configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"severity": "string", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

      
"file-size": "integer", The maximum file size for a single log file.
range: "1..2047"

      
"threshold": "integer", The size threshold at which a syslog is\ngenerated
range: "1..99"
units: "percentage"

      
"length": "integer", The maximum number of weeks of log to maintain
range: "1..256"

      
"frequency": "string", The collection interval for logs

range: "1..2047"

    },

MONITOR-LOGGING - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/monitor-logging/

Update operation of resource: monitor-logging

a1_monitor-logging_schema

monitor-loggingbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Set monitor loggingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Set monitor logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"nomatch1": "string", Set monitor logging no-match1 discriminator

      
"nomatch2": "string", Set monitor logging no-match2 discriminator

      
"nomatch3": "string", Set monitor logging no-match3 discriminator

      
"match3": "string", Set monitor logging match3 discriminator

      
"match2": "string", Set monitor logging match2 discriminator

      
"match1": "string" Set monitor logging match1 discriminator

    },
    
"logging-level": "string" Monitor Logging Level

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

HISTORY-LOGGING - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/history-logging/

Update operation of resource: history-logging

a1_history-logging_schema

history-loggingbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Set history loggingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"logging-level": "string", History logging level

    
"history-size": "integer" Logging history size
range: "1..500"
default: "1"

  }
}
200 OK

BUFFERED-LOGGING - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/buffered-logging/

Update operation of resource: buffered-logging

a1_buffered-logging_schema

buffered-loggingbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Set buffered logging parametersPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Set buffered logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"nomatch1": "string", Set buffered logging no-match1 discriminator

      
"nomatch2": "string", Set buffered logging no-match2 discriminator

      
"nomatch3": "string", Set buffered logging no-match3 discriminator

      
"match3": "string", Set buffered logging match3 discriminator

      
"match2": "string", Set buffered logging match2 discriminator

      
"match1": "string" Set buffered logging match1 discriminator

    },
    
"logging-level": "string", Logging level for Buffered logging

    
"buffer-size": "integer" Logging buffered size
range: "4096..4294967295"
default: "2097152"

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

HOST-SERVER - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/host-server/

Update operation of resource: host-server

a1_host-server_schema

host-serverbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Configure logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
VRF tablePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"vrf-name": "string", Name of the VRF instance
          : {
List of the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                : {
Severity/Port for the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  
"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                  
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

                },
                
"host-name": "string", Name of the logging host
                : {
Severity container of the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                    {
                      
"severity": "string" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                    }
                  ]
                }
              }
            ]
          },
          : {
List of the IPv4 logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                : {
Severity container of the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                    {
                      
"severity": "string" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                    }
                  ]
                },
                : {
Severity/Port for the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  
"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                  
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

                },
                
"address": "string" IPv6 address of the logging host

              }
            ]
          },
          : {
List of the IPv6 logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                : {
Severity container of the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                    {
                      
"severity": "string" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                    }
                  ]
                },
                : {
Severity/Port for the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  
"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                  
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

                },
                
"address": "string" IPv6 address of the logging host

              }
            ]
          }
        }
      ]
    }

              },
              : {
Severity/Port for the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                
"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

                
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

              },
              
"address": "string" IPv6 address of the logging host

            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

          
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

        },
        
"host-name": "string", Name of the logging host
        : {
Severity container of the logging hostPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            {
              
"severity": "string" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

a1_console-logging_schema

console-loggingbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Set console loggingPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"logging-level": "string", Console logging level
    : {
Set console logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"nomatch1": "string", Set console logging no-match1 discriminator

      
"nomatch2": "string", Set console logging no-match2 discriminator

      
"nomatch3": "string", Set console logging no-match3 discriminator

      
"match3": "string", Set console logging match3 discriminator

      
"match2": "string", Set console logging match2 discriminator

      
"match1": "string" Set console logging match1 discriminator

    }
  }

a1_files_schema

filesbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Configure logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : {
Specifications of the logging file destinationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"max-file-size": "integer", Maximum file size (in KB)
default: "1024"

          
"path": "string", File path

          
"severity": "integer" Severity of messages
default: "6"

        },
        : {
Set File logging discriminatorsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          
"nomatch1": "string", Set file logging no match discriminator 1

          
"nomatch2": "string", Set file logging no match discriminator 2

          
"nomatch3": "string", Set file logging no match discriminator 3

          
"match3": "string", Set file logging match discriminator 3

          
"match2": "string", Set file logging match discriminator 2

          
"match1": "string" Set file logging match discriminator 1

        },
        
"file-name": "string" Name of the file

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

DSCP - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/ipv4/dscp/

a1_dscp_schema

dscpbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {

ARCHIVE - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/archive/

Update operation of resource: archive

a1_archive_schema

archivebody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Archive attributes configurationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"severity": "string", The minimum severity of log messages to archive
default: "6"

    
"file-size": "integer", The maximum file size for a single log file.
range: "1..2047"

    
"threshold": "integer", The size threshold at which a syslog is\ngenerated
range: "1..99"
units: "percentage"

    
"length": "integer", The maximum number of weeks of log to maintain
range: "1..256"

    
"frequency": "string", The collection interval for logs

    
"device": "string", '/disk0:' or '/disk1:' or '/harddisk:'

    
"size": "integer" The total size of the archive
range: "1..2047"

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

range: "1..2047"

range: "1..99"
units: "percentage"

    
"length": "integer", The maximum number of weeks of log to maintain
range: "1..256"

    
"frequency": "string", The collection interval for logs

    
"device": "string", '/disk0:' or '/disk1:' or '/harddisk:'

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/ipv6/

Update operation of resource: ipv6

a1_ipv6_schema

ipv6body object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    {
      : {
Severity container of the logging host
        : [
No description
          {
            
"severity": "string" Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

          }
        ]
      },
      : {
Severity/Port for the logging host
        
"severity": "integer", Severity for the logging host
default: "6"

        
"port": "integer" Port for the logging host
default: "514"

      },
      
"address": "string" IPv6 address of the logging host

    }
  ]
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

CORRELATOR - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/correlator/

Update operation of resource: correlator

a1_correlator_schema

correlatorbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Configure properties of the event correlatorPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Table of configured rulesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
The Stateful Rule TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"timeout-root-cause": "integer", Rootcause Timeout (time to wait for rootcause)\nin milliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

            
"reparent": "null", Enable reparent of alarm on rootcause alarm\nclear
            : {
Table of configured non-rootcausePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"category": "string", Root message category

                  
"group": "string", Root message group

                  
"message-code": "string" Root message code

                }
              ]
            },
            
"reissue": "null", Enable reissue of non-bistate alarms on\nrootcause alarm clear

            
"timeout": "integer", Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"
            : {
The root causePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"category": "string", Root message category

              
"group": "string", Root message group

              
"message-code": "string" Root message code

            },
            
"context-correlation": "null" Enable correlation on alarm context

          },
          : {
Configure a specified correlation rulePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            
"category-name-entry10": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"message-code-entry10": "string", Correlated message code

            
"category-name-entry9": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry8": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry1": "string", Root message category name

            
"category-name-entry3": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry2": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry5": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry4": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry7": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"category-name-entry6": "string", Correlated message category name

            
"message-code-entry1": "string", Root message code

            
"message-code-entry3": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry2": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry5": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry4": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry7": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry6": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry9": "string", Correlated message code

            
"message-code-entry8": "string", Correlated message code

            
"group-name-entry9": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry8": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry10": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry1": "string", Root message group name

            
"group-name-entry3": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry2": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry5": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry4": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry7": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"group-name-entry6": "string", Correlated message group name

            
"timeout": "integer" Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

          },
          
"name": "string", Ruleset name
          : {
Applied to the Rule or RulesetPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Table of configured contexts to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
ContextPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"context": "string" Context

                }
              ]
            },
            
"all": "null", Apply to all of the router
            : {
Table of configured locations to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
LocationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"location": "string" Location

                }
              ]
            }
          },
          : {
The Non-Stateful Rule TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Table of configured non-rootcausePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"category": "string", Root message category

                  
"group": "string", Root message group

                  
"message-code": "string" Root message code

                }
              ]
            },
            : {
The root causePUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"category": "string", Root message category

              
"group": "string", Root message group

              
"message-code": "string" Root message code

            },
            
"timeout": "integer", Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

            
"context-correlation": "null", Enable correlation on alarm context

            
"timeout-root-cause": "integer" Rootcause Timeout (time to wait for rootcause)\nin milliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

          },
          : {
Apply the RulesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Table of configured contexts to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              
"context": "string" Context

            },
            
"all-of-router": "null", Apply the rule to all of the router
            : [
Table of configured locations to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"location": "string" Location

              }
            ]
          }
        }
      ]
    },
    : [
Table of configured rulesetsPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
          {
            : {
Applied to the Rule or RulesetPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : {
Table of configured contexts to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                : [
ContextPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"context": "string" Context

                  }
                ]
              },

              : {

                : [
LocationPUTPOSTDELETEGET
                  {
                    
"location": "string" Location

                  }
                ]
              }
            },
            
"name": "string", Ruleset name
            : {
Table of configured rulenamesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
Rule namePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"rulename": "string" Rule name

                }
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    ],
    
"buffer-size": "integer" Configure size of the correlator buffer
range: "4096..4294967295"
default: "2097152"

  }
}
200 OK

RULES - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/correlator/rules/

Update operation of resource: rules

a1_rules_schema

rulesbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Table of configured rulesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      {
        : {
Applied to the RulePUTPOSTDELETEGET
          : {
Table of configured sources to apply
            : [
Source
              {
                
"source": "string" Source

              }
            ]
          },
          
"all": "null" Apply to all of the router

        },
        : {
Causes of alarms to be suppressed
          : [
No description
            {
              
"category": "string", Category

              
"code": "string", Code

              
"group": "string" Group

            }
          ]
        },
        
"name": "string", Rule name

        
"all-alarms": "null" Suppress all alarms

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

RULES - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/correlator/rules/

a1_rules_schema

rulesbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json

  : {

    : [

      {
        : {

          : {

            : [
Source
              {

              }
            ]
          },

        },
        : {
Causes of alarms to be suppressed
          : [
No description
            {
              
"category": "string", Category

              
"code": "string", Code

              
"group": "string" Group

            }
          ]
        },
        
"name": "string", Rule name

        
"all-alarms": "null" Suppress all alarms

      }
    ]
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

a1_definition_schema

definitionbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Configure a specified correlation rulePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"category-name-entry10": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"message-code-entry10": "string", Correlated message code

    
"category-name-entry9": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry8": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry1": "string", Root message category name

    
"category-name-entry3": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry2": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry5": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry4": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry7": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"category-name-entry6": "string", Correlated message category name

    
"message-code-entry1": "string", Root message code

    
"message-code-entry3": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry2": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry5": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry4": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry7": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry6": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry9": "string", Correlated message code

    
"message-code-entry8": "string", Correlated message code

    
"group-name-entry9": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry8": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry10": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry1": "string", Root message group name

    
"group-name-entry3": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry2": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry5": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry4": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry7": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"group-name-entry6": "string", Correlated message group name

    
"timeout": "integer" Timeout (time the rule is to be active) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

in path

Request Example

  : {

    : {
Table of configured non-rootcausePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"category": "string", Root message category

          
"group": "string", Root message group

          
"message-code": "string" Root message code

        }
      ]
    },
    : {
The root causePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"category": "string", Root message category

      
"group": "string", Root message group

      
"message-code": "string" Root message code

    },
    
"timeout": "integer", Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

    
"context-correlation": "null", Enable correlation on alarm context

    
"timeout-root-cause": "integer" Rootcause Timeout (time to wait for rootcause)\nin milliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

STATEFUL - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/correlator/rules/rule/{name}/stateful/

Update operation of resource: stateful

a1_stateful_schema

statefulbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
The Stateful Rule TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"timeout-root-cause": "integer", Rootcause Timeout (time to wait for rootcause)\nin milliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

    
"reparent": "null", Enable reparent of alarm on rootcause alarm\nclear
    : {
Table of configured non-rootcausePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"category": "string", Root message category

          
"group": "string", Root message group

          
"message-code": "string" Root message code

        }
      ]
    },
    
"reissue": "null", Enable reissue of non-bistate alarms on\nrootcause alarm clear

    
"timeout": "integer", Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"
    : {
The root causePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"category": "string", Root message category

      
"group": "string", Root message group

      
"message-code": "string" Root message code

    },
    
"context-correlation": "null" Enable correlation on alarm context

  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

STATEFUL - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/correlator/rules/rule/{name}/stateful/

Create operation of resource: stateful

a1_stateful_schema

statefulbody object

name: string
in path

ID of name

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
The Stateful Rule TypePUTPOSTDELETEGET
    
"timeout-root-cause": "integer", Rootcause Timeout (time to wait for rootcause)\nin milliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"

    
"reparent": "null", Enable reparent of alarm on rootcause alarm\nclear
    : {
Table of configured non-rootcausePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          
"category": "string", Root message category

          
"group": "string", Root message group

          
"message-code": "string" Root message code

        }
      ]
    },
    
"reissue": "null", Enable reissue of non-bistate alarms on\nrootcause alarm clear

    
"timeout": "integer", Timeout (time to wait for active correlation) in\nmilliseconds
range: "1..7200000"
units: "millisecond"
    : {
The root causePUTPOSTDELETEGET
      
"category": "string", Root message category

      
"group": "string", Root message group

      
"message-code": "string" Root message code

    },
    
"context-correlation": "null" Enable correlation on alarm context

  }
}
200 OK

Response Content-Types: application/json

SUPPRESSION - Update

PUT Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/suppression/

Update operation of resource: suppression

a1_suppression_schema

suppressionbody object

Request Content-Types: application/json
Request Example
{
  : {
Configure properties of the syslog/alarm\nsuppressionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
    : {
Table of configured rulesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
        {
          : {
Applied to the RulePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Table of configured sources to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
SourcePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"source": "string" Source

                }
              ]
            },
            
"all": "null" Apply to all of the router

          },
          : {
Causes of alarms to be suppressedPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"category": "string", Category

                
"code": "string", Code

                
"group": "string" Group

              }
            ]
          },
          
"name": "string", Rule name

          
"all-alarms": "null" Suppress all alarms

        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
200 OK

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

Internal Error

Response Content-Types: application/json

SUPPRESSION - Create

POST Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-syslog-cfg:syslog/suppression/

a1_suppression_schema

Request Example
{
  : {

    : {
Table of configured rulesPUTPOSTDELETEGET
      : [

        {
          : {
Applied to the RulePUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : {
Table of configured sources to applyPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              : [
SourcePUTPOSTDELETEGET
                {
                  
"source": "string" Source

                }
              ]
            },
            
"all": "null" Apply to all of the router

          },
          : {
Causes of alarms to be suppressedPUTPOSTDELETEGET
            : [
No descriptionPUTPOSTDELETEGET
              {
                
"category": "string", Category

"group": "string" Group

              }
            ]
          },

"all-alarms": "null" Suppress all alarms

        }
      ]

  }
}
